Commencing in 2022, the CCS project includes the selection of a partner with the expertise to transport and permanently geologically sequester the COÃ¢ÂÂ.

Incitec Pivot's New Nitrification Inhibitors could represent an advancement in agricultural technologies to optimise nitrogen management. Nitrification inhibitors are substances that, when applied to soil, slow down the conversion of ammonium into nitrate, helping to improve nitrogen use efficiency and reduce environmental impacts.

column13: Mobile Processing Units (MPUs) are heavy vehicles used in mining operations to manufacture or blend bulk explosives at customer blast holes. Since 2021, Dyno Nobel has been developing and testing semi-autonomous MPUs. These units were designed and built in-house and, in 2022, were deployed to customer sites for field trials.

column13: Bag Recovery Trial by Incitec Pivot is an initiative to minimise waste and enhance environmental sustainability. This trial involves a systematic approach to recovering and recycling bags used in the company's operations. By implementing a structured process for bag recovery, Incitec Pivot aims to reduce the environmental impact associated with the disposal of packaging materials.
